colla.appl.developer_viewer.view

Class ChatWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • colla.appl.developer_viewer.view.ChatWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ChatWindow
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
    ChatWindow extends JFrame and contains a JTabbedPane were messages can be displayed in a tab which the tittle is the name of the sender of the message. It needs a list of User (contacts) to get the connection data
    Author:
    dmatos88 at gmail.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
